Module com.github.stephengold.joltjni
Package com.github.stephengold.joltjni

Class FilteredContactListener

java.lang.Object
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.JoltPhysicsObject
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.ContactListener
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.FilteredContactListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstJoltPhysicsObject, AutoCloseable, Comparable<JoltPhysicsObject>
public class FilteredContactListener extends ContactListener
A customizable ContactListener with configurable filtering.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FilteredContactListener()
    Instantiate a listener with no filters.

      Test whether the onContactAdded() callback is enabled.

      true if enabled, otherwise false

      Returns:
      the pre-existing instance, or null if none

    • onContactAdded

      public void onContactAdded(long body1Va, long body2Va, long manifoldVa, long settingsVa)
      Callback invoked (by native code) each time a new contact point is detected. Meant to be overridden.
      Parameters:
      body1Va - the virtual address of the first body in contact (not zero)
      body2Va - the virtual address of the 2nd body in contact (not zero)
      manifoldVa - the virtual address of the contact manifold (not zero)
      settingsVa - the virtual address of the contact settings (not zero)

    • onContactPersisted

      public void onContactPersisted(long body1Va, long body2Va, long manifoldVa, long settingsVa)
      Callback invoked (by native code) each time a contact is detected that was also detected during the previous update. Meant to be overridden.
      Parameters:
      body1Va - the virtual address of the first body in contact (not zero)
      body2Va - the virtual address of the 2nd body in contact (not zero)
      manifoldVa - the virtual address of the contact manifold (not zero)
      settingsVa - the virtual address of the contact settings (not zero)

    • onContactRemoved

      public void onContactRemoved(long pairVa)
      Callback invoked (by native code) each time a contact that was detected during the previous update is no longer detected. Meant to be overridden.
      Parameters:
      pairVa - the virtual address of the SubShapeIDPair (not zero)

    • onContactValidate

      public int onContactValidate(long body1Va, long body2Va, double baseOffsetX, double baseOffsetY, double baseOffsetZ, long collisionResultVa)
      Callback invoked (by native code) after detecting collision between a pair of bodies, but before invoking onContactAdded() and before adding the contact constraint. Meant to be overridden.
      Parameters:
      body1Va - the virtual address of the first body in contact (not zero)
      body2Va - the virtual address of the 2nd body in contact (not zero)
      baseOffsetX - the X component of the base offset
      baseOffsetY - the Y component of the base offset
      baseOffsetZ - the Z component of the base offset
      collisionResultVa - the virtual address of the CollideShapeResult (not zero)
      Returns:
      how to the contact should be processed (an ordinal of ValidateResult)

    • setBodyFilter

      public FilteredContactListener setBodyFilter(BodyFilter bodyFilter)
      Replace the listener's body filter.
      Parameters:
      bodyFilter - the desired filter, or null for none (default=none)
      Returns:
      the modified listener, for chaining

    • setBodyFilterMode

      public FilteredContactListener setBodyFilterMode(EFilterMode mode)
      Alter the body-filter mode.
      Parameters:
      mode - the desired mode (not null, default=Both)
      Returns:
      the modified listener, for chaining

    • setBroadPhaseLayerFilter

      public FilteredContactListener setBroadPhaseLayerFilter(BroadPhaseLayerFilter bplFilter)
      Replace the listener's broadphase-layer filter.

      Because onContactRemoved() callbacks lack layer information, broadphase-layer filters don't affect them.

      Parameters:
      bplFilter - the desired filter, or null for none (default=none)
      Returns:
      the modified listener, for chaining

    • setBroadPhaseLayerFilterMode

      public FilteredContactListener setBroadPhaseLayerFilterMode(EFilterMode mode)
      Alter the broadphase-layer filter mode.

      Because onContactRemoved() callbacks lack layer information, broadphase-layer filter modes don't affect them.

      Parameters:
      mode - the desired mode (not null, default=Both)
      Returns:
      the modified listener, for chaining

    • setEnableAdded

      public void setEnableAdded(boolean enable)
      Enable or disable the onContactAdded() callback.
      Parameters:
      enable - true to enable the callback, false to disable it

    • setEnablePersisted

      public void setEnablePersisted(boolean enable)
      Enable or disable the onContactPersisted() callback.
      Parameters:
      enable - true to enable the callback, false to disable it

    • setEnableRemoved

      public void setEnableRemoved(boolean enable)
      Enable or disable the onContactRemoved() callback.
      Parameters:
      enable - true to enable the callback, false to disable it

    • setEnableValidate

      public void setEnableValidate(boolean enable)
      Enable or disable the onContactValidate() callback.
      Parameters:
      enable - true to enable the callback, false to disable it

    • setObjectLayerPairFilter

      public FilteredContactListener setObjectLayerPairFilter(ObjectLayerPairFilter olpFilter)
      Replace the listener's layer-pair filter.

      Because onContactRemoved() callbacks lack layer information, layer-pair filters don't affect them.

      Parameters:
      olpFilter - the desired filter, or null for none (default=none)
      Returns:
      the modified listener, for chaining
